origin_question: 某旅游公司计划推出单日最长游览路线，需确定景点网络中两处最远地点的最短路径长度。计算该数值以评估行程时间是否合理？
question: A travel company plans to launch the longest single-day tour route and needs to determine the shortest path length between the two farthest points in the sightseeing network. Calculate this value to assess whether the travel time is reasonable.
